typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	Year as integer (2016)
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	dateFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss'],
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	preferredFractionalType: 'decimal',
	wildcardPaths:['DataLakeCleansing/raw/sales/\'+$Year+\'/**/*.txt']) ~> SalesOrderSource
SalesOrderSource select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> GetRequiredColumns
